Detailed Description

template<class Tx, class Tad>
class ReconstructionFirstOrder< Tx, Tad >

First order reconstruction.

Simple first order reconstruction where left and right states are taken to be the values of left and right cell.

Definition at line 36 of file reconstruction.h.

template<class Tx , class Tad >
void ReconstructionFirstOrder< Tx, Tad >::evaluate_chi ( const Array2D< const Tad > &  q,
Array2D< Tad > &  ql,
Array2D< Tad > &  qr 
)
virtual

\begin{eqnarray*} q_{left, i, j} = q_{i, j+1} \\ q_{right, i, j} = q_{i+1, j+1} \\ \end{eqnarray*}

Reimplemented from Reconstruction< Tx, Tad >.

template<class Tx , class Tad >
void ReconstructionFirstOrder< Tx, Tad >::evaluate_eta ( const Array2D< const Tad > &  q,
Array2D< Tad > &  ql,
Array2D< Tad > &  qr 
)
virtual

Reconstruct left and right state for all the eta direction faces.

Parameters
[in]qcell centered variable, includes ghost points. size: (nic + nhalo) x (njc + nhalo)
[out]qlreconstructed left state. size: nic x nj
[out]qrreconstructed right state. size: nic x nj

Reimplemented from Reconstruction< Tx, Tad >.
